---
title: "Random Places on Earth"
date: 2023-1-20
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```


```{r}
library(leaflet)
set.seed(2023)

df <- data.frame(id = paste('random place', seq(1,20)),
                 lat = runif(20, min=-90, max=90),
                 lng = runif(20, min=-90, max=90))

df %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(label=df$id)
```
